posts.post_content:
Some nice graded T212 Obaks for sale or trade!

***WILL CONSIDER TRADES FOR PSA GRADED T206 SOUTHERN LEAGUERS, T206 HOF CARDS, OR ANY T212 SERIES***

(1) Each order will have a fixed $5.00 shipping charge no matter how many cards are ordered.      
(2) First come, first serve.  The first person to communicate "I will take ..." via PM or e-mail at [url]jtlake67@att.net[/url] gets the card(s).  You are welcome to post a reply to the post, but I'm going to go by the time stamp of the message in cases where multiple parties express interest.
(3) Paypal F&F only.  Send payment to [url]timlake@nc.rr.com[/url] and be sure to indicate your mailing address. If payment is not received within 48 hours of me acknowledging the order, I reserve the right to cancel the transaction.

Please also see my PSA graded T206 cards that are available (over 100).

1909 T212 Obak Flannagan - PSA 1.5 - $70
1909 T212 Obak Tennant - PSA 2 - $90
1910 T212 Obak Harkins - 175 Subjects - PSA 1 - $28
1911 T212 Obak Coy - PSA 3 - $50

Please e-mail me at jtlake67@att.net for scan requests.  

Thanks!

Tim
